1: At nimajcual Dios, lâin incßaß ninnimobresi cuib, chi moco ninkßetkßeti cuib, chi moco naxic inchßôl riqßuin xtzolbal li xnînkal ru naßleb li chßaßaj xtaubal ru.
2: Relic chi yâl lâin cuanquin saß xyâlal ut cßojcßo inchßôl. Chanchanin jun li cßulaßal toj xrakeß chi tußuc ut cßojcßo chic xchßôl.Lâex aj Israel, chex-oybenînk riqßuin li Kâcuaß chalen anakcuan ut chi junelic.
3: Lâex aj Israel, chex-oybenînk riqßuin li Kâcuaß chalen anakcuan ut chi junelic.
